scripts.supabase:types:gen: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > packages/supabase/types/supabase.types.ts
scripts.supabase:migrate: npx supabase migration up && pnpm run supabase:types:gen
scripts.supabase:reset: npx supabase db reset && pnpm run supabase:types:gen
scripts.db:reset: pnpm run supabase:reset && pnpm run seed
